hero.subtitle: Senior specialist in urology, transgender health, and reconstructive surgery.

about.title: Dr. Matías Caradonti
about.paragraph1: Physician graduated from the University of Buenos Aires (UBA) School of Medicine in 2010, with a university specialization in Urology. He achieved the top residency GPA at the Central Aeronautical Hospital and was awarded the senior title in Urology by the Argentine Society of Urology and the National Academy of Medicine.
about.paragraph2: He currently serves as Head of the Transgender and Reconstructive Health Service at Hospital Santojanni (Buenos Aires City), and as Head of Urology at Hospital de Navarro and OSCHOCA. He is a lecturer at UBA and UMAI, a reviewer for scientific journals, and a consultant on new technologies applied to medicine.
about.paragraph3: His practice combines medical excellence, surgical innovation, and an empathetic, patient-centered approach, with the goal of improving quality of life through a modern and humane perspective.

services.title: Urology Center Services
services.description: Our center offers a comprehensive and specialized approach to urologic health, combining cutting-edge technology with a medical team in continuous training. Each patient receives personalized care in a professional and empathetic environment.

service1.title: Urology Consultation
service1.description: Evaluation and follow-up of the male and female urinary system.

service2.title: Laparoscopic Surgery
service2.description: Minimally invasive procedures that support faster recovery.

service3.title: Stone Treatment
service3.description: Diagnosis and management of kidney and urinary stones with modern techniques.

service4.title: Reconstructive Surgery & Transgender Health
service4.description: Specialized, human-centered care in gender-affirming and reconstructive procedures.

service5.title: Prostate Health
service5.description: Prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of conditions such as BPH or prostate cancer.

service6.title: Erectile Dysfunction & Men's Sexual Health
service6.description: Comprehensive, personalized care for sexual disorders and urologic dysfunctions.

contact.title: We are here to support you every step of the way
contact.description: Leave us your inquiry and we will get back to you shortly. Your health is our priority.

sweetalert.successText: Thank you for contacting us. We will respond shortly.
sweetalert.errorText: There was a problem sending your inquiry. Please try again later.

testimonial0.quote: After years of uncertainty, I found in Dr. Caradonti and his team the support and professionalism I needed for my transition. I am deeply grateful for their dedication and empathy.
testimonial0.name: Lorena

testimonial1.quote: After several failed surgeries, today I can urinate normally. Thanks to Dr. Matías Caradonti and his team for their commitment.
testimonial1.name: Sergio

testimonial2.quote: It was a difficult journey, but today I feel whole. Thank you, Dr. Caradonti, for supporting me every step of the way.
testimonial2.name: Nataly

testimonial3.quote: I felt accompanied, supported, and cared for at all times. I’m happy with the result. Thank you for the human and professional quality with which I was treated.
testimonial3.name: Dafne

testimonial4.quote: I underwent feminizing genitoplasty and I’m grateful to Dr. Matías Caradonti for his support at all times.
testimonial4.name: Johana

testimonial5.quote: I followed every instruction with commitment and received the same from Dr. Matías Caradonti and his team. Thank you for so much.
testimonial5.name: Nicole

blogProfesional.title: Professionals
blogProfesional.subtitle: Updates on urology, surgery, and new technologies.
blogProfesional.description1: Here you'll find the latest developments in urology, minimally invasive surgery, and new technologies applied to healthcare.
blogProfesional.description2: We share articles, clinical experiences, updates from conferences, courses, surgical techniques, and scientific advances that are shaping our specialty.
blogProfesional.description3: Our goal is to provide reliable, up-to-date, and useful information for healthcare professionals who want to keep growing and learning.

blogPaciente.title: Patients
blogPaciente.subtitle: Clear and reliable information about your urologic health.
blogPaciente.description1: In this space, you'll find articles and news crafted especially for you, covering urologic health topics, treatments, post-surgical care, and prevention.
blogPaciente.description2: Our goal is to offer clear, reliable, and simple information so you can better understand your health, resolve doubts, and feel supported every step of the way.
blogPaciente.description3: Because we believe that being well-informed is essential for making confident decisions and taking care of your well-being.
